content.query:
/*
External table definitions for...
- dbo.FactSales
- dbo.DimDate
- dbo.DimItem
- dbo.DimSalesPerson
- dbo.DimCustomer
*/


USE [spulletjes_DW]
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.FactSales
WITH
(
	LOCATION = '/FactSales',
	DATA_SOURCE = GoldLayer,
	FILE_FORMAT = ParquetFormat
)
AS
SELECT *
FROM dbo.vw_FactSales
